summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2492, for the improvement of Greenwood Avenue, from North 39th Street to North 45th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 27289 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
